name: Stellarium Virtual Telescope
description: A virtual telescope that allows testing the feature without an installed telescope.

description: A telescope compatible with Meade's AutoStar controller.

description: Meade LX200 or a compatible telescope.

name: Wildcard Innovations Argo Navis (Meade mode)
description: Wildcard Innovations' Argo Navis DTC in Meade LX200 emulation mode.

name: Celestron NexStar (compatible)
description: Celestron NexStar or a compatible telescope.
